channel.title: Men on Butterfly Dream
channel.description: Recent content in Men on Butterfly Dream

item.title: Sacrifice
item.description: Women All of what is written in the linked article is true, women are generally expected to make all the sacrifices for a marriage; or more accurately, trained to believe to give up all their hopes and dreams and live according to the lives their husbands choose for them. And no matter how much we want it to be not true, it is. Even the modern woman feels the pressure from family and society to conform to these social norms.
